hadith.chapter: The Book Pertaining to the Merits of the Companions (Allah Be Pleased With Them) of the Holy Prophet - كتاب فضائل الصحابة رضى الله تعالى عنهم
hadith.arabic-text: وحدثناه ابن نمير، حدثنا عبدة، عن هشام بن عروة، بهذا الإسناد إلى قوله لا ورب إبراهيم ‏.‏ ولم يذكر ما بعده ‏.‏
hadith.english-text: This hadith has been reported on the authority of Hishim b. 'Urwa with the same chain of transmitters up to the words: " No, by the Lord of Ibrahim," and he did not make mention of what follows subsequently.
